team_0070_cassiopeia_02a: Giacomo’s Star Badge is now yours, then?[VAR 0114(0009)]

team_0070_cassiopeia_02d: Mela’s Star Badge is now yours, then?[VAR 0114(0009)]

team_0070_cassiopeia_04a:
With its boss out of the picture, the Segin Squad
is pretty much done for.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_04b:
Now that its boss has been taken down, the Navi
Squad’s days are numbered.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_04c:
With its boss no longer around, the Ruchbah
Squad is as good as finished.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_04d:
Now that there’s no boss to lead them, the rest
of the Schedar Squad shouldn’t last long.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_04e:
Without its boss, the Caph Squad should be a
hair’s breadth from disbanding.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_06: Sorry, I’ve got a lot on my mind right now...[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_07:
So, Operation Starfall. You’ve taken down all but
two bases, so it’s fair to say it’s going well.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_08:
This seems like a good time to let you know what
we’re ultimately aiming to achieve.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_09:
Our final goal...is to defeat the mastermind that
first recruited the five squad bosses and created\r
Team Star. The one they call the [VAR COLOR(0006)]big boss[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_10:
Who knows? They control the five squad bosses
from the shadows... That’s all anyone can say.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_11:
If we defeat this person and get them to declare
the team disbanded, that’ll be it for Team Star.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_12:
Since the big boss never set up their own base
and keeps their identity hidden, I take it they’re\r
not one for the spotlight.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_13:
But once all the squad bosses are out of action,
the big boss’ll finally have to take the stage.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_cassiopeia_15:
Now, about your reward. I’ll transfer some LP
over to your phone, as promised.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_system_03:
You can now make more kinds of TMs using the
TM Machine!
team_0070_cassiopeia_14:
Have your Pokémon learn strong moves so that
they can continue to be of use to the operation.\c
My supply unit rep should be with you soon.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0070_botan_02:
That, uh...sounded like a pretty serious
phone call.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_03: Uwagh! I wasn’t talking to you![VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_05:
So, that mastermind you were talking about...
Cassiopeia’s mentioned them to me, too.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_06:
Team Star’s founder... The person who’s caused
all kinds of misery at the academy...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_07:
If we don’t take them down, I’ll lose what I
treasure most in the world.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_09:
Um...that’s right! You need your reward!
Here—take it before I forget.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_system_04: You received lots of Pokémon [VAR COLOR(0008)]materials[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
team_0070_botan_10: All right, well, I’ll be off, then...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0070_botan_11:

Don’t\r
lose\r
to\r
those guys.[VAR 0114(0008)]
